text: @NickBoles their case/death is better, its not NZ I grant you, but its better than ours. Meanwhile the french probably have confidence in their Gov, taking action based on health, NOT profits, and that should case/death rates go up, localised lock downs will happen https://t.co/9d3JS5LGuA
